section.title: AUT configuration for Windows desktop AUTs
section.para: To be able to start a Windows desktop AUT, you should select the win toolkit as the AUT toolkit in the AUT definition dialog.
You must enter the following information to be able to start a win AUT:

listitem.para: Enter the basic configuration details as described earlier ().
Enter the executable file name in the Executable File Name field. This path can be relative if you define a working directory ()).
Enter any necessary command-line arguments for the AUT in the AUT Arguments field.
